code: import React from'react';import{getCart,checkout,getOrders}from'../api/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(_ref){let{token}=_ref;const handleCart=async()=>{try{const cart=await getCart(token);if(cart.cart_id&&cart.item_ids&&cart.item_ids.length>0){const itemIds=cart.item_ids.join(', ');window.alert("Cart ID: ".concat(cart.cart_id,", Item IDs: ").concat(itemIds));}else{window.alert('Cart is empty');}}catch(error){window.alert('Failed to load cart');}};const handleCheckout=async()=>{try{await checkout(token);window.alert('Order successful');}catch(error){window.alert('Checkout failed');}};const handleOrderHistory=async()=>{try{const orders=await getOrders(token);const orderIds=orders.map(o=>o.id).join(', ');window.alert("Order IDs: ".concat(orderIds||'No orders'));}catch(error){window.alert('Failed to load orders');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCheckout,children:"Checkout"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCart,children:"Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleOrderHistory,children:"Order History"})]});}export default Header;
